movie-description: The story of Kenji Miyazawa, the famous Japanese poet, science-fiction writer, teacher, and amateur scientist. Like "Shakespeare in Love," the movie is a rather-fictionalized account of a brief period in the authors life, culminating with the creation of his most popular work - in this case, "A Night on the Galactic Railroad."
movie-title: Ihatôbu gensô, Kenji no haru (TV Movie 1996)
movie-short-description: Directed by Shôji Kawamori, Stuart J. Levy.  With Shirô Sano, Mariko Kouda, Chikao Ohtsuka, Victor Chin. The story of Kenji Miyazawa, the beloved Japanese poet, who also wrote Night on the Galactic Railroad.
